name: Blood Thief
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 44 with other people.

You incarnate a Vampire in his quest to vengeance and blood lust ! Your goal is to kill a particular buddy within the levels without getting caught by anybody. Your weapons ? You fangs of course but also your dark powers :

  • Killing at distance
  • Becoming invisible!

Of course, those powers will drain your only life force : your blood. So use them cautiously!

More can be found on the Ludum Dare Page:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/blood-thief

Credits:

  • Smatcher - 3D Models, Texturing, Programming
  • Otakode - Programming, Unity3D specialist
  • Vince - Programming
  • pplans - Programming, Art (Effects, UI, …)
  • XunBel - UI
  • Music by Artem_G https://www.jamendo.com/artist/376456/artem-g, specially https://www.jamendo.com/track/889941/vampire
